message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $150. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $140.  Would that work for you?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $130 for the product. I hope this is within your range.
